Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Taragon Road, near a broken section of the village wall.
Room.LongDescription: The mayor's office keeps promising to send a construction crew to repair the wall, but it has ben seventeen years since a copper dragon crashed into the wall, destroying a section of it and killing the dragon's rider. Through the break in the wall, you can see sheep in a green pasture, and a heavily wooded area further to the east. On the west side of the road is a fortune teller's small shack.
